question: The third edition of international spice conference will be held in __________.
explanation: The third edition of international spice conference will be held in Jaipur, Rajasthan. Arancha Gonzalvez, the Executive Director of International Trade Centre, Geneva, will inaugurate the conference. The event will be jointly hosted by the All India Spices Exporters' Forum and Cochin Chamber of Commerce and Industry. The central theme of the 2018 conference would be 'Managing Disruptions through Transformation and Collaboration'.
